argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dmexg | |- ( R e. V -> dom R e. _V ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rnexg | |- ( R e. V -> ran R e. _V ) |
| 3 |  | #P_xpexg | |- ( ( dom R e. _V /\ ran R e. _V ) -> ( dom R X. ran R ) e. _V ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( R e. V -> ( dom R X. ran R ) e. _V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_unexg | |- ( ( R e. V /\ ( dom R X. ran R ) e. _V ) -> ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) e. _V ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mpdan | |- ( R e. V -> ( R u. ( dom R X. ran R ) ) e. _V ) |
